title: Leave Buster issues
body:
So i just got put into low priority queue for 10 matches due to leaving a game right after i finish a ranked game
I did disconnect from the game for 5 minutes due to my WiFi issues but i returned and was able to finish the game in about 10 minutes later
after the game there was a message about how i was put into low priority queue so i think this is a mistake since i did connect back into the game but still get punished
Please help

replies.body:
>for 5 minutes

The threshold that Leaverbuster uses is five minutes. That's just rotten luck, that.

Riot will not remove any low-priority queue punishments its system gives to players under any circumstances.

I do not agree with this, but that's they way they set it. It's to avoid corruption.

IMO they should review each case personally.
